website_summaries.verdict: You'll spend the same as you would on other collars, but these are made of soft leather and can be engraved.
pros: These attractive leather collars offer a great value
They can be engraved with the dog's name and your phone number as well as small hearts or paw prints, meaning you won't have to hear tags jingling
cons: Leather can be a little stiff at first
You can't choose where the hearts or paw prints will go
Can be difficult to select right size

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy quality didn't last 8 days will surely risk your dog's life.
customer_reviews.text: My rescue dog broke out of this exactly one week after I received the collar. We were walking around the park and my dog lunged at another dog and they both ran into the road. The other dog was hit. I'm seriously shaking as I write this. This collar is a death sentence for any stronger dogs in training. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quick!
customer_reviews.text: Love these collars. I couldn't believe how fast they shipped. I have a 15 pound rat terrier and a 14 pound terrier / long hair chihuahua mix. After reading reviews I ordered extra small for them. On My 14 pound mix the collar fits on the next to last hole. On my 15 pound rat terrier the collar fits on the very last hole. I wish I would've gotten small for him but the collar fits so I'm happy. The leather is of good quality, a little stiff. Overall it's a very nice collar.
customer_reviews.author: amylebleu26

customer_reviews.title: DOGerrific
customer_reviews.text: Dog parents can be just as a scary consumers as parents of kids. We have been know to boycott business, right scathing reviews everything from dog walkers to dog hotels. We like professionalism, cuteness and craftsmanship. We want to deal with companies that do not use cheap products on the inside or outside of our four legged kids. I must say I was shocked just how cute, upscale and worthy of my kid to wear this collar was. The leather is not cheap, the letters are engraved not printed, it doesn't rub his neck and its super cute. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. S

customer_reviews.title: Color wearing off after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this colar when i got it! So much so that i bought another when we rescued another pup. Unfortunately, the first color is really showing wear. It looks sloppy now and the telephone number is harder to read without the color contrast. I am really sad, these collars are soft, cute, and unobtrusive for my little mutts but its starting to look so poorly :( im upset that i spent so much on them now in order to support a small Vermont business. We took it off for baths and done use anything unnatural on our pets.
customer_reviews.author: NightOwl275

customer_reviews.title: My six-year old dog who has had many collars before ...
customer_reviews.text: My six-year old dog who has had many collars before hates it and refuses to wear it. He keeps itching his neck when he is wearing it and cannot wait to take it off, which makes me think the leather on it is uncomfortable for his skin. He has zero skin issues that we know of and he goes to the vet for regular check-ups. There is no way to return it so I guess I'll forever be stuck with a collar he hates and will not wear.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful collars
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm so pleased with these collars. I ordered two for my dogs, one in XS and one in M, and they arrived much more quickly than I expected and exactly as I ordered. I browsed other leather collars online and these collars were so much cheaper that I was worried that they might be bad quality, but they are exactly what I hoped for. One other small thing that I like is that the buckle is opposite of the text, so the text part naturally rests on the back of my dog's neck and is visible to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: lptocinoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good collar but lacks loop
customer_reviews.text: This is a good leather collar, but it lacks the loop needed to hold down the excess leather after buckling. I've had to resort to using sturdy rubber bands otherwise my dogs would have 3" of extra leather sticking straight out -- I could cut it, but then it would lose that finished look. It's a shame, too, because otherwise these are excellent collars. The lettering is nice and the colors haven't faded -- we'll see how they hold up through a summer of swimming in a few months. We used to have nylon collars with info stitched in, but they held odors and had to be washed more often than the dogs. This is not an issue with leather.
customer_reviews.author: dfwdxb

customer_reviews.title: Strong, functional, stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these adorable collars. I loved the buckle style, instead of the plastic clips. Our pets are on walking leashes a lot. It gave us more peace of mind, with the metal buckles. These collars are sturdy and well made. The collars have retained there colors though several washing, after the dog park.I liked how they personalized each collar. I had pups names and my phone number on the there collars.( they are chipped also). I will be diffenitly recommend these collars.
customer_reviews.author: kelly Hedberg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable collar!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar for my westie. He doesn't mind the new collar at all. I washed Rascal (my westie), with his old collar and pulled so hard, he was bleeding on the back of his neck. I felt so bad for Rascal, that had to get him I got him this collar. The old collar was a narrow leather collar and I never really liked it. Sorry I rambling but I do love Rascal, and this bleeding incident never happened before. He was so wanting to to jump out of utility tub that I had to tie him to a water pipe. Poor guy will not have to go through that again with again with this collar.
customer_reviews.author: BlazeCat

customer_reviews.title: Second collar
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a collar, X-Small, green. I loved it and it fit my dog perfectly. He is a Shih Tzu mix. As he grew I had to get a lager size. I got the Small in orange. I love the length of the collar, I just wish it was the same width as the X-Small. My dog doesn't like to wear this collar as much as the previous one. Very good craftsmanship. I would recommend this collar to any of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected. Looks really cute, only problem is it is too large for my pup. I measured his neck before ordering and it is still way too large. I tried making an extra hole to fit him better but ended up almost ripping the whole thing apart. The end of the collar hangs out quite a bit long as well so my dog was able to get a hold of the end and chewed it up. I even tried tucking the end into the collar which helped for now but I don’t see this lasting longer than a month. A little bummed because it is super cute
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Carbajal

customer_reviews.title: You must know the right size very important to know the size
customer_reviews.text: These collars are huge my dogs will never be able to wear them smh i have mini pins they will necer be big enough for this monster neck colloars although very nice looking there super thick but it was a lost in money for me the photo and description does not warn you about size not everyone knows measurements it should have accurate pictures and more detail about size. Don't get me wrong if I had a big dog I definitely what use this even if it broke because my dog was wild but unfortunately I have no use for this so it's a total waste of money and now I have two collars I can't do anything with
customer_reviews.author: Crazy shopper gotto have it

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the results - with there were more colors (text and collar) to choose from.
customer_reviews.text: The collars arrived earlier than expected. Ordered two for troublesome dogs that love to destroy material collars (using them in tug-a-war contests). So far they haven't liked the leather so they are not using destorying them. My only recommendation is more options for colors. For my Cody, his red collar is a good bright red, but the collar really needs white lettering against red, not black. The other collar is light blue. I would have preferred dark blue also with white lettering. The quaility is good. The leather is not hard and the collars are easy to work with. Even with the limited colors, I would purchase again and will if needed. The price is excellent for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: BTCTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: As far as a collar goes, this is a decent one. It was the only customizable (name and phone number) leather collar I found when I purchased it. It's a very durable collar but there are definitely areas it can improve on. The lettering/numbering fades after awhile but will still be readable. The collar is really lacking an additional loop to hold down the extra when you're using one of the smaller holes. The area where the buckle is gets tripled up in thickness and is too think in my opinion. The width and length of he collar are appropriate however.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Tan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a chewing tornado!
customer_reviews.text: Our newly rescued 9-month-old Pomeranian is a chewing terror! She didn't just chew her old collar but also those of our other 2 rescued dogs. This leather collar is perfect for her. The metal buckles stay secure, can't be mangled or cracked in half, and the craftsmanship is beautiful. I bought an extra small as her neck measured 10" and it fits great. I love the fact that the name isn't covered up with the size adjustment (a problem I've had with other personalized collars). Thank you for this beautiful product.
customer_reviews.author: chicagokathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My dog has worn the same leather collar for about 10 years. He would keep wearing it except the poor thing keeps catching his dewclaw in the tag holder. (The little circle thing that attaches his dog tag to the collar.) He just screams in pain! 😪I’m afraid he’s going to rip that nail out.I thought I would get a collar that didn’t have any tag issues. I found these! I love the way they look and the price was right too. Very quick shipping! they even followed up to make sure they had everything correct before they started working on it. It’s a beautiful color and now my dog can’t catch his claws On it! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and great customization
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make a special gift for some kids during the COVID-19 crisis. The collars will be on stuffed animals so they will not get the same wear and tear a normal collar would undergo. Therefore, I cannot comment on sturdiness or durability. They look solid, but without proper wear and tear, I do not know how they would hold up. Despite that, these collars are very cute and the customization turned out really well. I am very pleased with the delivery and look of these and they work great on the stuffed animals I bought. I am using the XS collars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Collar sizes are BIG
customer_reviews.text: Cute green personalized collar that arrived quickly with accurate personalizing. Would’ve been perfect if my pup was a Bulldog, German Shepherd or even Great Dane. However, I have a Chinese Pug, which is why I ordered what was advertised as a collar for ”small dogs.” What arrived was much bigger then any small-dog collar I’ve ever purchased. It seemed like they were letting me print a lot of text; now, I know why. It’s a shame, because I can’t return with my dog’s name and my phone number on it. Hell, I can’t even give it away. I suppose I’ll keep it in case my dog ever needs a cast for his neck. Don’t be misled by the advertising.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for both of my dogs as “dress collars” for our upcoming vacation so I was pleased they arrived quickly since many deliveries seems to have been delayed. They are made of a decent quality leather and the name and phone number placement is perfect. My only issue with the green collar I ordered they chose orange for the letters and it doesn’t show up as sharp as the black lettering on the orange collar I purchased. I think black would have looked better but it’s still nice and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini68

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking collars
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a pink one for our female and a green one for our male. The pink color looks great and the engraving really stands out. The green color is nice too, but the engraving does not stand out as well as it does on the pink. We might go with blue for our male next time based on that. They've only worn them for a week, but they seem very sturdy. We're hoping they hold up well over time. Product shipped very quickly and received within a week of ordering. We've already gotten compliments on them. Happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HAP

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a small for our 19 lb French Bulldog. It fits comfortably on the last hole which is perfect so there isn't a lot of extra flapping around. Also, if I needed to, I could punch an extra hole. The lettering is a bit off center , but that will be the case on any collar unless your dog's neck is sized exactly to the center of the collar, not a fault of the vendor. The leather is thick yet flexible and the letters are cut out nicely, crisp and centered properly to the width of the collar. We would gladly order again and most likely will when our other dog's collar wears out.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, runs small
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10-15 lb schnauzer mix & the small just fits him on the last hole. It fits great but I would have liked some extra length but he wears a harness to walk bc he’s a puller and I don’t trust a collar so this is for looks and if he runs away. The blue is a very pretty color, almost a minty blue but less green than a true mint. I don’t know that it’s very sturdy for any dog that would constantly pull because it feels a little flimsier than an expensive leather collar. You get what you pay for but it’s a darn good deal for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Devlebaba

customer_reviews.title: Love It~Think Hurricane Planning
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Large for my Catahoula female and its perfect. This collar is obviosly meant for ID purposes, not training for strong aggressive dogs, so I expect it will last a suitable timeframe for us. I have a 2 acre animal sanctuary and take in unwanted domestic and farm animals. I get tired of hearing dog tags clinking all day and night so I'm very pleased with this purchase. It arrived VERY QUICKLY, text, color and sizing is perfect. Great collar for hurricane planning. Love it, and will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Carols Critters

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Dog and it is amazing! I ordered him a XS when the size chart told me to get a S. I did not want to have a big piece hanging off so he can chew on it. With the XS there is still more than enough room for his neck. They paw prints and font looked so cute. They collar is sturdy and it comes with a little ring for the leash. It is also pretty light, and the colors are true to the picture, well at least the blue is.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collars and workmanship. Not good for smaller dogs though. They are too thick, wide, and long...and yes I sized my dogs appropriately. These would be great on a medium to large dog. The collars looked ridiculous on my small dogs. The dogs were not happy and kept scratching their necks while wearing. Since I provided a size, I would have expected appropriate dimensions in all directions of the collar. These collars would dwarf an extra small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Friedland

customer_reviews.title: Quality Collars with Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great collars - I ordered one for my [65-lb] “Princess,” who is a delicate flower and will likely never leave the yard; and another for the family rascal, my son’s dog, who regularly jumps our fence while chasing after squirrels! I’m so happy with the collars, the colors are bright, the text clear and legible, and I feel confident knowing that they won’t drop them as easily as a name tag. I’m also certain that they’re going to last for a long time! Also, customer service worked to resolve an issue with my order, very helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar and excellent customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice personalized leather dog collar! I purchased the blue in size XS and it is a very pretty sky/baby blue color. We wanted to get a "non-jingly" version of a collar that would still have ID capabilities and this works perfect. The personalization and stitching quality are great! This collar is quite a deal for the price in my opinion. Not only is the product great but so is the seller! She responded timely to my inquiry and went above and beyond to make sure I was 100% happy with my purchase. Thank you Donna for taking such good care of your customers!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and no more jingling tag-- Woohoo!!
customer_reviews.text: The average collar has 4 issues when it comes to my pup: 1. Absorbs stank. 2. Loosens over time, risking escape into the wilderness. 3. Neverending tag jingling that evokes pure fury. 4. Has plastic clips that can break and release the fence-jumping hound. This collar has none of those issues. Only downside, I can't pretend he's not mine if he runs away and causes trouble. If your dog has metal allergies, this may cause irritation, but on all other accounts this is an ideal collar.
customer_reviews.author: S. Seng

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the seller communicated with me promptly about my questions and concerns regarding size, etc. My dog, a 15 lb Bichon, was on the border of S and X small and i went toward S. Definitely the right choice. The seller seemed to want to make sure all went well. Wonderful to work with a seller who was responsive and helpful. The collar is attractive and fits well. I just want a leash to match, and can’t seem find one online or on the same website.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: High quality but not for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made collar! I bought this for my dog who keeps eating his collars and tags. I'm giving this a 3 because it's too bulky for my dog (6 pound chihuahua) and so he can't wear it due to discomfort. For me, it was a complete waste of money for my dog, but it's made well and would be a great buy for a medium or large sized dog who could handle wearing a heavier collar. Do not recommend for small dogs since the leather is very thick and heavy so best suited to only larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.  Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I was so surprised by the quality of the collar when it arrived. It appears to be high quality thick leather. I am looking forward to a collar that is not going to wear out. I had my dog's names engraved into the leather. Great quality work with that too. We ordered two collars one pink and one orange both colors are as expected. Keep up the great work. I have only had these collars for a couple days. I will come back later with an update.
customer_reviews.author: standsinrain

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our long-haired Chihuahua. At first we thought that it would be to thick - it is really well made and seams could not be ripped out easily. Then, somehow our personalization didn't stick to the order, the seller emailed me to make sure that I didn't actually want any personalization - I did, and 2 days after I answered the seller's email, the collar arrived. We have 3 dogs, we will get 2 more of these from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Brkpnt

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these collars for my two big dogs and so far I LOVE THEM! I got so tired of hearing the metal dog tags every time they moved especially in the middle of the night...one prefers to sleep on the cool tiles and I'd hear that ID tag scrape against the tiles. 🤦‍♀️ soooo annoying. But I was able to fit both dogs names plus my phone number on these collars and they still look good. Seller even reached out to me to make sure I received them and if I had any questions. All good here!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: HAppy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT Seller!! I bought two personalized dog collars with two different sizes. Before they completed the order, they emailed me confirming the order where I realized I accidentally switched the two sizes for the two dog names. I replied to their email corrected the error... and a couple days later... I received a PERFECT order with the correct sizes and names. The collar is a thick leather... feels as though it will last a long time. The laser writing is very clear and visible. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: HaileSelassie

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. The colors are vivid. The lettering is clear . They fit all 7 dogs perfectly. And they came so quickly. I couldn't believe it was the collars already. I even noticed after I put in the order that I had made a mistake on one of them, leaving out a space between the dog's name and the phone number. I thought it was too late. But the person who did the handiwork obviously used common sense and fixed it. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality collars!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful collar! I purchased two, one in blue for our boy and one in pink for our girl. The engraving is nice and clean, no rough edges, no lifting, overall very pleased! We opted to add their names and our phone number for additional identification resources. Our dogs are high energy and have a tendency to loose their dog tags so this was a great alternative for us! We’ve had these collars for a couple of months now and they still look as great as day 1! I also appreciate that the hardware is metal as I don’t have to be concerned about it snapping or wearing out as with someo of the plastic hardware.
customer_reviews.author: REVIEW FROM THE PNW

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased For Several Reasons
customer_reviews.text: This is not a flimsy collar or poor quality. The thickness of the leather, the durability of the buckle and leash hook are high quality. I do not like having tags hanging from a collar as they can get hooked on things, lost or worn down and no longer readable. Being able to engrave this collar with name, phone number and that she is microchipped was perfect. I thought it would take awhile to make and send this but it was sent the day after I ordered. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: r&m

customer_reviews.title: Information delivery
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one for our shepherd/husky mix who escapes from time to time, we received a call from a neighbor stating she was at their door. We retrieved her immediately. Prior to that when she escaped, in spite of being chipped & wearing engraved dog tags, we'd be out driving around our rural area for several hours, calling till we were hoarse. So, we've purchased one for our standard poodle & plan to buy 2 more for our ankle biters. They are grrrreat!!
customer_reviews.author: Pypwr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality collars for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: These collars greatly helped my peace of mind while going on a ten day trip and leaving my pups behind. Although they are microchipped I like that if they were to get lost, it would be quick and easy for someone to call me if they are found. We have had the dangling name tags for our dogs before and would get woken up at night because of the tinkling sound the metal on metal would make. No more of that! These collars look exactly as I had pictured and are adjustable so it can grow with my youngest pup.
customer_reviews.author: Ella M

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice. Super quality and seems very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice. Super quality and seems very durable. It arrived faster than anything else in my cart that I purchased the same day even though I was preparing to wait longer for it than everything else according to the projected date of arrival. The only downside to that would be if I had made a mistake in my customization request. They probably started customizing it the minute they received the order to have shipped it this quickly! Thankfully, it is perfect! Make sure you get your text and numbering request correct :)
customer_reviews.author: Aliza Violet

customer_reviews.title: Nice Collar For a Dog That's Sensitive to Nylon
customer_reviews.text: I like to put my phone number on the collar itself since my dog tends to break off any tags. I was looking for one that was made of leather because he has shown some sensitivity to nylon collars. I've had this collar for about a month now and so far it has held up well. The text itself is just burnt into the leather and not colored in any way. It is easily read up close, but not really legible from any distance. However, it does what I need it to do and has held up well through runs in the woods and almost daily baths.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog collars
customer_reviews.text: The personalized leather collars are very good looking and seem sturdy and well made. The sizing described by the seller is accurate (I ordered a medium and a large), although the large is pretty big! (We have it in the last hole and I thought we might need to add a hole! There is no way our bigger dog could have worn a medium though!) I love that I don't have to add a noisy metal ID tag to my dogs' collars! I am very pleased with these collars.
customer_reviews.author: Gidge63

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Looked good when I got it, so cute too. But after only about 5 months the leather had cracked and you couldn't barely see the text. My dog is a large breed so the cracking probably came from walking her and putting strain on it and the text was damaged from her sleep positions and seldom scratching. Maybe would last longer on a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: shanna

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but was weary right at opening. As you can see in my pictures it seems like it was 'engraved' much too shallow. The color of the collar is a very thin cheap coat of latex paint it seems. It is peeling terribly bad. The day we opened it it lost the edges of the color. She is a primarily indoor dog. Only out to potty. Collar hasn't been wet, or twisted or anything to cause this damage. Just typical wear by a doodle. 😪😔
customer_reviews.author: A Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SMALL DOG AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice collar and seems good quality. But I have a Min Pin and ordered a small. This collar is huge and it will never in his lifetime fit. A size SMALL I think would actually fit a dog the size of a beagle or cocker spaniel maybe. Definitely not a small dog like a chihuahua or dachshund or min pin or anything smaller than 25 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: YupYup007

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, Well Made, & No Jangly ID Tags Needed!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness this collar is gorgeous and so well made! We ordered it for our 80-lb American Bulldog “Buddy” and couldn’t be happier (and neither can Buddy!) We selected it after the ID tag broke on his old collar and we specifically wanted to avoid the jingle jangle of metal tags. It is very thick yet soft leather. I put only 3 stars for “Stretch” because it’s leather so it doesn’t stretch but the sizing is great based on the measurements they provide here as a guide and they punch plenty of holes for you to adjust the size as needed. Feels like it will last forever! Also appreciate that it was custom made in the USA. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute collar!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar. It’s super cute and made from quality leather. The edges are not rolled but I don’t believe it’s an issue or will create irritation for my pet. It was very stiff out of the package but I’ve rolled it a few times and it’s quite a bit softer. The lettering is super cute and Well done. The seller has this out for delivery with amazing speed and it arrived a day earlier! Completely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: abel

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars, you can just tell from the feel that they are going last a long, long time. The craftsmanship is beautiful and always correct since you're emailed to confirm contact that everything is right before they ever start to make the collar. I wish more companies did that! Customer service is a wjn! I have ordered several collars for my dogs and yes, my cats too. These collars are the ones I'm sticking with for my future pets, not sure these guys will ever need another.
customer_reviews.author: CAWL

customer_reviews.title: Really well made but it did not work for my small dog
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, beautiful. Unfortunately it did not work for my dog. The Extra small size length is perfect for my dog but the fact the collar is still wide and the metal pieces are big and bulky made it too heavy for my 8 lb dog. It weighs a bit too much on my dog's neck. The leather is beautiful but it is not as soft/light as I expected to be. Since it’s a customized product, I cannot get a refund on it. I’d still recommend it for medium/large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: RXavier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar - with an important caveat
customer_reviews.text: This collar is well constructed with quality materials. The color (pink in my case) was excellent. The labeling is deeply embossed and bound to be durable. The caveat? When ordering for our 25# dog, I didn’t realize that the width would be so big 1”). It looks ridiculous on the dog and I won’t be using it. My mistake, of course but, if ordering for a smaller dog, consider the proportions. No issues with the quality, rapid delivery, etc.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. N.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you choose the right size!
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise, this collar arrived 10 days sooner than the estimated date. The collar is very well-made and looks exactly like pictured on the website. I do have to say that I wish they have offered better colors to choose from. Also, I did have some difficulties deciding the size, at one point, I chose Small and then I read a customer's review and changed it to XS, which turned out to be exactly the right size.
customer_reviews.author: WeLovePhoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with the quality of the leather and how soft the inside was. It arrived only a few days after ordering it and looks perfect. They sent an email confirming our information before they made it and we could not be more pleased with the customer service. I had been worried about our dog getting lost without a tag as his kept falling off and I love the peace of mind this gives me, at least they will be able to call us if he gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT AND FAST SHIP!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my three dogs prior to a vacation trip. They arrived within 2 days and they are perfect! They look great on my dogs and the workmanship is very high-end! Very sturdy and well made. I cannot believe what a great price. Thank you! Highly recommend!!! I have three dogs 50-70 lbs and I ordered the Large Collars. I probably could have gotten the Medium, but I wanted to be on safe side. We just made another hole to tighten to the fit needed.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: I have had dogs and thus collars for 60 years. This is the BEST ever! So well made, doesn't chafe the neck like some leathers do, personalization is clear, so far is holding up to a 14 month old who tries to "puppy play" by neck nipping which wears out a collar. Not this one:). I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice collar. I bought it for my German Shepherd/Pitt mix. She's a rather large lady and it fits perfect around her neck. The craftsmanship is ideal and really beautiful! It's a sturdy collar with clear lettering. It's the best collar I've bought for r her !
customer_reviews.author: Hey Y'ALL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to customize
customer_reviews.text: Well I absolutely adored these! Easy to customize and I loved the color I picked out! We got the blue. Sizing was a guessing for me. I have a XL bully pit. When it arrived he knew it was for him. We only ordered one for a test run for our dogs. When we put it on him, it fit perfectly! He was showing it off to the other dogs... which ended up getting chewed off his neck..... dogs are always playing. Which I mean one of the dogs had to off chewed on the collar for a while for it to come off. Will I be ordering again. Most definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Identification from a distant.
customer_reviews.text: A good leather collar is hard to find. My local pet store doesn’t even carry them. These are great. They are sturdy and fit well. I know when a pet gets away, it is often difficult to catch them. The engraving on these collars is so good that the name and number is visible at a distance. Calling the dog by his name or even being able to call the owner as soon as he is spotted may make all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Erma P. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Dog Collar Meets All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: My short haired mutt, who is nearly bald on her underside, was constantly chaffed by the ID tags on her collar. Having her information carved right into the collar has been a wonderful thing for her...no more sore neck. The leather is a bit stiff, but it doesn't bother her. I leave it loose enough so it doesn't rub her raw. The only thing I would change about the collar is to have an option of a smaller print so I could have added that she has food allergies.
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I'd think I'd look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Note, our dogs are indoor dogs. When we received these, I was happy with how they turned out. However, we have had 2 of these collars for about 2 years now for our dachshunds. We had the names put in and a special image with selected colors on the collars. After 2 years, the colors have completely come off, the stamped info we requested is completely gone, and there are several severe cracks throughout the leather. We are now looking for new collars for our 2 dogs. For leather collars, I would expect them to last much longer than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Viertel

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Alot of times online sellers advertise leather collars and when you get them they are thin and flimsy - not this one! Very impressed by the thickness, quality and durability of this collar. I have some engraving done and that was also topnotch. I also like the fact that there are 2 rings so that the end of the collar stays laying down and not sticking up if there was only one ring. Well done!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Purdy

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a fantastic collar. I wasn’t expecting such good quality from a $15 collar but wow! It’s beautiful. She just got it so I can’t touch on durability right now. But it is thick and the leather is nice and the words are ingrained so I don’t think it will run anytime soon. Fits her perfectly. I’m beyond pleased and I got it early! I’ll be ordering another for my other dog.
customer_reviews.author: Cubascaramel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love my dog’s new collar. I got the Xs in pink with her name, phone number, and hearts on it. She is walked with a harness, but I wanted some form of ID on her. She is a 6.5 lb Chihuahua and it fits perfectly. Not too wide for her little neck. The collar is made really well and looks like it will last for many years. Because of the nature of the material, it does not stretch. Great value and terrific workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: 3dogmom

customer_reviews.title: We love it so far.  Updating to say it is super durable.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is outside a lot and I love this collar because it is easy to wipe off so it looks nice when we are out and about. I have a labrador and got the medium if I were to do it again, I would get a large. I wish I could tell when I first completed this. I think we got our first one a year ago. It is the light blue/aqua. Still looks great. Washes off easily. Just got another one for one of our year old 'puppies'. And it shipped SUPER FAST!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Kellner

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleasantly surprised at how good this collar is. Firstly, it arrived incredibly quickly for a custom product. It seems to be of very good quality material; I expected much less for the price. I was replacing a $37 dogID collar-which I liked for some features that this doesn’t offer (room for address and phone number, reflective, etc) but I appreciate the quality, price, and the aesthetic appeal of the Custom Catch collar. I also appreciated the handwritten “thank you” from Donna at Custom Catch. Hopefully it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: a.ladybird

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but maybe not suitable for hard puller dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This collar is gorgeous on my dog. Got many compliments! Cons: it’s gotten scratched up from my dog scratching at her neck once in a while. Problem with leather. Also it only held up for a month with my dog. I have a cane corso, about 70 lbs, who was running pretty hard and basically got closelined by herself (i was more upset than she was about the whole thing 😭) during that event her collar tore. Understandable, but I’d make the recommendation if you have a big dog that pulls pretty hard- to maybe not use this collar as the main source of restriction. Maybe have a harness for restraint, and collar for looks lol.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: All Hardware fell off - have message in to seller
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two colors for my two Labradors. All of the hardware fell off the within one month of wearing. Have contacted the seller and we will see what they say. I was very surprised this happened since these collars had such good ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmar3rd

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This collar is a great quality. My dog, who is a really active hyper dog who plays a lot, has been wearing this since I received it in the mail. It is still in perfect condition and for my dogs first collar, it doesn't bug him at all. I actually don't even think he notices that he has it on. It also fits well when we place him in his harness for walking and being outside, so he can still wear both of them at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collars! Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time purchasing these collars and we have Been extremely pleased both times. we only bought another round because our beagles roll in the mud and I am too lazy to clean them 😂 they are really great quality and the colors are bright. 10/10 I’d recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great dog collar!
customer_reviews.text: Got one as a puppy and of course he grew:). This is his second one and who knows if he will grow some more? But this collar is perfect and my neighbors asked where I got his collar:). And of course we told them where:). Great service and of course great DOG COLLARS:) And BTW he is 1 1⁄2 years old and he is a Dashund at 21 pounds and I hope he does not grow anymore for our sake:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! This is our second one because our dog likes to roll in poop so we decided to buy a back up!! He’s so gross but we love him!! But seriously this is a great collar. My dog would rip the hanging dog tag off so this he can’t take off and I feel safe that if he ever God forbid gets lost he has this collar on to help. I highly recommend this collar!! It’s a good one ❤️
customer_reviews.author: april tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute personalized collars. We had name and phone # put on them. Great quality also. I struggled keeping dog tags on my dogs because of the noise. My husband is a light sleeper. I used to take off the collars when the dogs were inside the house but we had a few incidences where they got out. Luckily the neighbors knew us and brought them back but this makes me feel better knowing my # is always on their collar.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Text incorrect/not as requested/defective
customer_reviews.text: The text on the item was very incorrect. I received a confirmation email with the correct text. But the item that arrived was horribly formatted. There were dashes inserted where they were not supposed to be and there was no forward slash in the spot which was in the confirmation email. This was a waste of my time when they don’t even pay attention to the details. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle User

customer_reviews.title: Updatet
customer_reviews.text: This collar arrived on time and is as described. Our previous collar had a plastic clip that broke after a few weeks. This collar has a metal buckle which is more secure and provides a better fit on our dog. It is extremely well made and the lettering is beautiful. We have showed it to some friends and they plan to order one for their dog. I highly recommend this product and comp Bought this collar in Feb. 2018. Less than one year the loop holding the D ring broke during a walk. No excess strain, it just broke. Nice looking collar but now useless. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Personalized Collar!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece of craftsmanship! I wanted a personalized collar for my dog w/ his name and my phone number. I don't like the 'jingle/jangle' of tags on a collar and I didn't want a metal clasp. This classic leather collar absolutely fit the bill and couldn't be more perfect! I chose orange which is Scooter's 'fave' color and it looks great. The name and numbers are very clear and legible and already he's gotten so many compliments on it. This is great for your dog and would certainly make a wonderful gift as well! Very happy with my purchase and it was delivered quickly and in time for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Hentz

customer_reviews.title: Not durable for full time use. Engraving is gone.
customer_reviews.text: I got this collar for a dog who likes to lose her engraved hanging tags. I bought the (very cute!) collar on June 14, not two months ago. Already the information is illegible and useless and the collar is significantly less cute, with the pink worn off. It’s been bad for a few weeks yet, I just hadn’t had a chance to write a review yet. I had been happy with the collar until I saw that the reason for the collar (identification) didn’t last 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: WhyCantItBeWirelessToo?

customer_reviews.title: Great Custom Collars!
customer_reviews.text: I truly adore this company. I have bought from them over three times (I have two dogs). Their customer service is so good that I will continue to support and buy from them. Not to mention how good the collars look. We always get compliments on our dog’s collars. The collars are durable, sturdy, comfortable to the dogs and nicely made. We will continue to order new and different color ones.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is a little too small for the collar right now unless we use the smallest setting - but then the extra is so long that she wants to chew on it. It would be great if there was another slider to hold that excess, but not a deal breaker because it will fit her as she grows! What I love about this collar is that with it being engraved, I don’t have to hear the jingle of tags all the time! I’ll be buying another one for our larger dog for that reason alone! 😁
customer_reviews.author: MamaB

customer_reviews.title: Super Impressive and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the collar. First, the lettering is nice and will not rub off like many companies (carved into the leather). Second, the leather is super thick to withstand aggressive dog play at the park. Third, delivery was SUPER fast (had it in under a week). Fourth, cannot believe the quality versus the price. Great bargain on so many levels.
customer_reviews.author: Ky Mama

customer_reviews.title: Well made dog collar
customer_reviews.text: This dog collar is so cute! I ordered the collar in yellow and with the black print it looks very nice on my little blonde-haired terrier mix. The print is easy to read and a nice size; the fabric doesn't feel like it will wear thin any time in the future. My order was made, fulfilled, shipped and received by me within 4 days. I will order this again, probably in pink, just to give my little girl dog a variety of collar colors.
customer_reviews.author: EthansNanaBear

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: So, I have the dog with the neck of in between sizes. There was not enough holes and the smallest hole there was 7 inches of collar sticking straight out. I will have to take it to a leather worker to put a few more holes in it and to cut the end off & sew it back together. I might have to make ask him to make a part to tuck in the extra length. I will not order this type of collar again.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: First of all is not soft leather , it’s hard harsh leather I asked according to their instructions my dog it’s small this collar they sent it’s for a big dog, the collar it’s almost his whole size. It just doesn’t fit my dog and even if I tighten he would get loose. The collar is for a big dog , so hard leather and thick with a small neck something is wrong
customer_reviews.author: Macbeth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice collar
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed. The collar is well made, nice leather. The printing was clear and well done. It was also an extremely fair price too. I am going to order one for my other pup as well. I really appreciated custom service efficiency. I typed an extra no. in my phone no. They immediately sent me a note to clarify. Excellent catch! I highly recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict!

customer_reviews.title: Quality just isn’t there
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea to get this special collar for our new puppy. When we received it however the quality was NOT there. The Engraving was messy and looked awful to me( blobbing spots and zigged looking lines .Only reason we kept is because my son still loved it even with the imperfections and felt this his puppy needed it. I am hopeful to find a different company to order from. The collar it’s self is nice and soft and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The collars look great. I made sure to measure my dogs' neck size and ended up ordering one small and one medium for my two dogs. The small one was just big enough for my smaller dog and the medium was just a little big on my larger dog. The small size would not have fit. The printing and colors were just as I ordered and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Odub

customer_reviews.title: great  product  don't miss out on this deal
customer_reviews.text: Great product and super sturdy only bad thing I could say is I wish the name was a little darker but still absolutely love and more important our puppy seems to like the feel we have had others that seem to bother him this he doesn't even seem to notice its on. Would have loved If it was offered in black with white lettering would definitely purchase another because of how comfortable our pup seems to be with it
customer_reviews.author: ashley rowlett

customer_reviews.title: Colo
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure a small would fit my 3 yorkies b/c they are a bit different in sizes. I was happily surprised they fit & had extra room for a larger sized small pet. Weight of my boys 18 lbs -chubsie wobsie 15 lbs - all muscles thinks he's a cat with his jumps & climbing skills. Pure yorkie hunter 12 lbs - my Energizer bunny - always running around
customer_reviews.author: P. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely measure your dog or cats neck, I just went and winged it and got a small, it was a weee bit to tight but I was able to make one more tiny hole at the end and it fits perfect now! It’s so adorable and the service from the company is amazing. Super easy and not as expensive as going to a pet store and getting it done! Thank you for making such a lovely collar for my puppy!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: The product is missing a second loop to keep the excess leather from sticking up. I didn’t rate the durability as I couldn’t use it. Very disappointing. I reached out to the manufacturer who offered to send a smaller size but by that time I had cut off the excess leather. In the end I spent more money buying a different one that is adjustable and went back to the I d tag option 🙁
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for the doggo was a hit
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely crafted collar. Soft and pliable for a leather collar and the etching of her name and my number was superb. I had bought a collar for her a couple of years ago that was nylon with her name and my number embroidered onto it. It was really dirty after one year and I paid a bunch for it. This was less expensive and a much nicer collar for our pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great collar and lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is the second collar I have purchased for my pet. The first one has been in use for almost a year and was worth every penny, and more, that I spent on it. My Siberian husky loved to break out and run. Three different tinted he got away from me and I received a call very quickly from the kind people who found him. What a relief. I only got a new one due to a phone number change. Thanks foot such a durable and dog saving collar!
customer_reviews.author: Kymara

customer_reviews.title: The dog collar is cute and the quality is excellent. The imprint engraving is nice as it will ...
customer_reviews.text: The dog collar is cute and the quality is excellent. The imprint engraving is nice as it will not wear off over time. My pup doesn't seem to be bothered by the collar at all and it sits perfectly. I have a shih-poo, about 6-7lbs. We had some shipping trouble and the first order was lost in transit (not Seller's fault). The Seller was excellent and shipped me a replacement promptly at no charge!
customer_reviews.author: Review4you

customer_reviews.title: Well made and really cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pink collar in small. It is personalized with our dog's name, our phone number and two paw prints. The collar itself is well made and the hardware (buckle, leash clip) is sturdy and high quality as well. If I have to complain about something, I would say that I wish our phone number was in smaller print than the dog's name. Fits as expected. My dog is inbetween a small and an extra small, so most collars are either loose, or tight on her. This one is a little loose too, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your pet!
customer_reviews.text: This collar is great! Nice and sturdy leather and hardware, also big letters on the collar so easy to read our pets name and phone number. I have two neighbors that have seen her new collar and are ordering these for themselves and gifts. I just think this is such a great and easy way to provide this important information for your pet, in case they go missing and like I said, the workmanship of the collar is excellent! Very happy with our purchase and I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice but to wide for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are personalized but the collars are way to wide for my girls. I got small because that's what they need. The small collars are 3/4 inch wide and it looks really wide for their small bodies. I found another personalized collar that's only 5/8 inch wide that I'm going to purchase. They are nice made collars but they just don't look good on small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality....
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a nylon engraved collar which broke in about 2 weeks. This is a well made, quality product. Love the leather and the engraving. Looks wonderful on my dog. Should have saved my money and just ordered this from the beginning. Update.....it's been over 3 months since I received the collar and placed it on my dog. I have to say I'm not happy. All the lettering and numbers have worn off. Getting ready to toss it in the trash and hopefully find something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Super product and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my personalized dog collar on Weds and it arrived on Saturday!! The leather is thick enough to last a life time but not too heavy so as to be too stiff for the dog. I love the fact that I can put the dog's name and my telephone number on the collar just in case he gets lost or takes himself out on a "self walk."
customer_reviews.author: JTW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we buy from this company. They last a very long time and the personalized collar is exactly what you see on line. The second collar was bought as a medium because our dog grew but it was big so we had to adjust the collar and make a hole to make it fit. No fault of the company. I didn't measure correctly. So we are working with what we have. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd review: I like this collar enough to order a second one for the second dog. As all leather products it's a bit stiff at first but softens with wear. I really like that there is no jingling or chewing of the tags. The engraving makes it really eazy to see her name and phone number. - 1st review: The engraving is very nice. The groomer even complimented the new collar and asked where we got it. I'm forwarding her your information. It's definitely thicker and slightly heavier than his last collar, but I don't think the dog minds too much. He seemed to adapt to it after a day.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Better for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Got one for a larger dog- 45 pounds and growing and it worked GREAT. Looked awesome. Great quality. Bought another for a much more delicate 14 pound dog and no matter how loose or tight I made it, it seemed to dig in on her chest and cause a sore to start to form. She’s got a funny build with a long neck and maybe that’s the issue. Great quality, very practical, but just didn’t work out on the little pup.
customer_reviews.author: Laura, the Mainah

customer_reviews.title: Great collar for dogs who hate tags
customer_reviews.text: This collar was to replace an identical one that our Yorkie wore for about five years. he weighs ten pounds and is a size XS. He hates wearing tags, so this collar is perfect! The only thing I would ask is to allow one more letter on the collar so I could spell out the word “diabetic” on it, along with his name and phone number. I settled for leaving off the last letter. Hopefully that will be enough if he should somehow get out of the yard and away from our care.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPurchaser

product_meta.title: Custom Catch Personalized Dog Collar - Engraved Soft Leather in XS, Small, Medium or Large Size, ID Collar, No Pet Tags or Embroidered Names
product_meta.description:
A personalized dog collar that ships from the USA on the next business day! Don’t choose a collar shipped slowly from China, our shop is in Vermont.
Soft pink, blue, green, orange, yellow or red leather with different text styles to choose from. 1 inch wide for M or L size. 3/4 inch collar width for small size. 1/2 inch width collar for extra small size. Personalized dog collars are perfect as a service dog collar, a dog wedding collar or any other use you can imagine! Made of genuine leather, engraved in Vermont. A truly high quality customized pet id alternative. These custom dog collars replace pet tags and cheap embroidered collars. Customizable with your phone number and your puppy or dog’s name, or anything you want! The most durable, heavy duty variation on dog id tags. The best dog collar when it comes to keeping your dog safe. Comes in large, medium, small or xs collar sizes. Custom pet collars make your dog stand out from the rest. Metal id dog tags are noisy and become lost or become unreadable while a dog collar with name engraved is permanently readable. 100% guaranteed quality. We are absolutely sure you will love this collar.
Collar size is based on your dog's neck measurement - Please measure your dog's neck and leave room to slide 2 fingers under the tape measure or string when snug around the dog's neck.
(XS) Dog Collar for XS Dogs: 8.5”-11” Neck Measurement
(S) Dog Collar for Small Dogs: 11.5”-14” Neck Measurement
(M) Dog Collar for Medium Dogs: 14.5”-17.5” Neck Measurement
(L) Dog Collar for Large Dogs: 18”-22” Neck Measurement
feature_bullets: PERSONALIZED DOG COLLAR – Engraved leather collar with name, phone, or other text of your choice
COOL TEXT STYLES – CLICK “CUSTOMIZE” ON THE RIGHT TO VIEW YOUR OPTIONS
BONE, HEART OR PAW DESIGNS - No additional cost

(XS) X Small Dog Collar: 8.5”-11” Neck Measurement, (S) Small Dog Collar: 11.5”-14” Neck Measurement, (M) Medium Dog Collar: 14.5”-17.5” Neck Measurement, (L) Large Dog Collar: 18”-22” Neck Measurement
100% guaranteed quality – we are confident you will be pleased with your new, durable, dog id collar!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
